column5: Sorry for the Lack of Reports just been a crazy summer for me ..Well what a summer Walleye fishing on Fire Salmon fishing on Fire ...couldn't ask for a better summer for fishing other then its HOT ...best baits have been spin doc and fly combo short leads off the riggers down 75 over 155 ...mag dipsy back 158 on a 2 setting with E-chips and meat ...here are a few pics get out and enjoy ...            http://www.fishmastersultimatecharters.com
Great pictures!  the one thing I noticed is the kings don't look as fat as last year.  What are the bait levels out there?
Nice pics,that lake is on fire.Love to try that one day!

coincidence that the lake has 4 - 6 foot waves today and this post shows up?  Just kidding Fishmaster - some nice outings there. Hear on the radio you had been having some good days - That'd make the customers smile for sure.
